## Description {#details}

Strategy that injects operations into the function.

## Public Member Functions

### getWeight() {#a1c7024bfc9fd530d6cc7cb693d31e598}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::InjectorIRStrategy::getWeight (size&#95;t CurrentSize, size&#95;t MaxSize, uint64&#95;t CurrentWeight)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Provide a weight to bias towards choosing this strategy for a mutation.

The value of the weight is arbitrary, but a good default is &quot;the number of
distinct ways in which this strategy can mutate a unit&quot;. This can also be used to prefer strategies that shrink the overall size of the result when we start getting close to <code>MaxSize</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h/#l00101">101</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h">IRMutator.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### mutate() {#af80c59250b5a5e540d6eaeb458be693a}

  labels = {["virtual"]}>

Mutators for each IR unit. By default these forward to a contained instance of the next smaller unit.
